title: Lead Bus Driver and Evaluator
status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (179 day calendar)Minimum Requirements:A minimum of one year WCSD of bus driving experience is required.Must hold and maintain a valid Utah Commercial Driver’s License.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 4 of the MN Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkMN Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Lead Bus Driver & Evaluator.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
